description:
Play Classic Mahjong choosing from 300 layouts in three difficulty levels. Or try another variation: In "Countdown" you only have 20 minutes. Train your memory with "Remember", donâ€™t dally in "Shuffle" or search for particular tiles in "Match".

The tiles are strikingly sharp, making them easy to recognize. If you are stuck, hints will help you out!
name: 5 in 1 Mahjong
